;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
; Room: Test big room
;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
.(
	.byt RESOURCE_ROOM
	.word (res_end - res_start + 4)
	.byt 0
res_start
; No. columns, offset to tile map, offset to tiles
	.byt 128, <(column_data-res_start), >(column_data-res_start), <(tiles_start-res_start), >(tiles_start-res_start)
; No. zplanes and offsets to zplanes
	.byt 0
; No. Walkboxes and offsets to wb data and matrix
	.byt 6, <(wb_data-res_start), >(wb_data-res_start), <(wb_matrix-res_start), >(wb_matrix-res_start)
; Offset to palette
	.byt 0, 0	; No palette information
; Entry and exit scripts
	.byt 255, 255
; Number of objects in the room and list of ids
	.byt 0
; Room name (null terminated)
	.asc "Test big room", 0
; Room tile map
column_data
	.byt 001, 003, 003, 003, 003, 003, 003, 003, 003, 003, 003, 003, 003, 003, 003, 018, 003
	.byt 002, 006, 003, 003, 003, 003, 003, 003, 003, 003, 003, 003, 003, 003, 010, 019, 003

; Room tile set
tiles_start
	.byt $7F, $7F, $7F, $4F, $73, $7C, $7F, $7F	; tile #1
	.byt $7F, $7F, $7F, $7F, $7F, $7F, $4F, $73	; tile #2
	.byt $7F, $7F, $7F, $7F, $7F, $7F, $7F, $7F	; tile #3
	.byt $7F, $7F, $7F, $7F, $7F, $7F, $7C, $73	; tile #4
	.byt $7F, $7F, $7F, $7C, $73, $4F, $7F, $7F	; tile #5
	.byt $7C, $7F, $7F, $7F, $7F, $7F, $7F, $7F	; tile #6
	.byt $7F, $4F, $73, $7C, $7F, $7F, $7F, $7F	; tile #7
	.byt $7F, $7F, $7F, $7F, $4F, $73, $7C, $7F	; tile #8
	.byt $7F, $7F, $7F, $7F, $7F, $7F, $7F, $4F	; tile #9
	.byt $7F, $7F, $7F, $7F, $7F, $7F, $7F, $7C	; tile #10
	.byt $7F, $7F, $7F, $7F, $7C, $73, $4F, $7F	; tile #11
	.byt $7F, $7C, $73, $4F, $7F, $7F, $7F, $7F	; tile #12
	.byt $4F, $7F, $7F, $7F, $7F, $7F, $7F, $7F	; tile #13
	.byt $73, $7C, $7F, $7F, $7F, $7F, $7F, $7F	; tile #14
	.byt $7F, $7F, $4F, $73, $7C, $7F, $7F, $7F	; tile #15
	.byt $7F, $7F, $7F, $7F, $7F, $4F, $73, $7C	; tile #16
	.byt $7F, $7F, $7F, $7F, $7F, $7C, $73, $4F	; tile #17
	.byt $7F, $7F, $7C, $73, $4F, $7F, $7F, $7F	; tile #18
	.byt $73, $4F, $7F, $7F, $7F, $7F, $7F, $7F	; tile #19
	.byt $40, $5F, $5F, $5F, $5F, $5F, $5F, $5F	; tile #20
	.byt $40, $7F, $7F, $7F, $7F, $7F, $7F, $7F	; tile #21
	.byt $40, $7E, $7E, $7E, $7E, $7E, $7E, $7E	; tile #22
	.byt $5F, $5F, $5F, $5F, $5F, $5F, $5F, $5F	; tile #23
	.byt $40, $5F, $5F, $5F, $5F, $5C, $5C, $5D	; tile #24
	.byt $40, $7F, $7F, $7F, $7F, $40, $40, $7F	; tile #25
	.byt $40, $7E, $7E, $7E, $7E, $4E, $4E, $6E	; tile #26
	.byt $7E, $7E, $7E, $7E, $7E, $7E, $7E, $7E	; tile #27
	.byt $5D, $5D, $5D, $5D, $5D, $5D, $5D, $5D	; tile #28
	.byt $4E, $4E, $4E, $4E, $4E, $4E, $4E, $4E	; tile #29
	.byt $40, $5F, $40, $55, $4A, $55, $4A, $55	; tile #30
	.byt $40, $7F, $40, $55, $6A, $55, $6A, $55	; tile #31
	.byt $40, $7E, $40, $54, $6A, $54, $6A, $54	; tile #32
	.byt $4A, $55, $4A, $55, $4A, $55, $4A, $40	; tile #33
	.byt $6A, $55, $6A, $55, $6A, $55, $6A, $40	; tile #34
	.byt $5D, $5D, $5D, $5D, $5D, $5C, $5C, $40	; tile #35
	.byt $4E, $4E, $4E, $4E, $4E, $4E, $4E, $40	; tile #36
	.byt $6A, $54, $6A, $54, $6A, $54, $6A, $40	; tile #37
	.byt $7C, $73, $4F, $7F, $7F, $7F, $7F, $7F	; tile #38
	.byt $4F, $73, $7C, $7F, $7F, $7F, $7F, $7F	; tile #39
; Walkbox Data
wb_data
	.byt 000, 007, 013, 016, $20
	.byt 008, 015, 013, 016, $00
	.byt 016, 024, 013, 013, $00
	.byt 016, 024, 016, 016, $00
	.byt 025, 119, 013, 016, $00
	.byt 120, 127, 013, 016, $40
; Walk matrix
wb_matrix
	.byt 0, 1, 1, 1, 1, 1
	.byt 0, 1, 2, 3, 2, 2
	.byt 1, 1, 2, 1, 4, 4
	.byt 1, 1, 1, 3, 4, 4
	.byt 2, 2, 2, 3, 4, 5
	.byt 4, 4, 4, 4, 4, 5

res_end
.)
